title.narrative: Health: Toward Ending Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting in Africa and Beyond- Social Change Communication

description.narrative: This activity (Health: Toward Ending Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting in Africa and Beyond- Social Change Communication) is a component of Health: Toward Ending Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting in Africa and Beyond reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £5,212,787. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Health education, Reproductive health care, Human rights, Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services. The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 31-12-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
